FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 21-08-2024 13:00:47   (GMT +5:30)
REFERÎ•NCE NO: 17723341 


ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL

MV  STELLAR RIONI  -HDY - OPEN JINZHOU - 26-31 AUG 2024

MV  STELLAR INDIGO 
IMO : 9780316
bulk carrier
liberia flag, built 2017
38,242 mt dwat on 10.028 m ssw
loa/lbp/bm: 182.87m / 179.95m / 31m
depth moulded :    14.5 m
grt/nrt: 24655 / 12351
grain/bale 49,759 / 48,621 cubm
Ho/Ha :    5/5
Hatch size :
 No.1 : 17.50 m X 19.10 m
 No.2 : 20.70 m X 22.70 m
 No.3 : 20.70 m X 22.70 m
 No.4 : 20.70 m X 22.70 m
 No.5 : 20.70 m X 22.70 m
Type of hatch operation    : Hydraulic Operation

Strengthened for heavy cargo
4 x 30 mt electro-hydraulic cranes

ABT 13,0KNOT (L) / ABT 13,5KNOT (B)
ON ABT 21.5MT(L) / 20.5MT(B) IFO(380CST) PLUS 0,1MT MDO AT SEA
(UNDER GOOD WHEATHER, BF UNDER 4, WAVE HEIGHT UNDER 1.9M)
VSL HAS OPTION TO BURN MDO I/O IFO NARROW WATER, CANAL, RIVER, PORT-IN/OUT, ETC.
IN PORT :(IDLE/WORK) ABT 3,0/4,5MT IFO PLUS 0,1MT MDO
all abt, in ECA vsl to use mgo i/o ifo

ECO SPEED/CONS(WOG/REF ONLY);
B 11.0/L 10.5 ON 16.5 IFO + 0.1 MGO
ada

PLSD TO HEAR.
 
BEST REGARDS,
